function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Highly resistant variants of COVID-19 continue to emerge","Impact":"Prolonged pandemic with ongoing waves of infection","Mitigation":"Vaccination campaigns targeting variants, development of new treatments, and strict public health measures","Technologies":"Genomic surveillance for early detection of new variants, mRNA technology for vaccine development","People":"General public, healthcare workers, vulnerable populations","Owner":"Public health authorities, pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Asymptomatic infections pose a challenge for disease control","Impact":"Unrecognized spread of the virus, difficulty in containment and isolation of infected individuals","Mitigation":"Development of rapid and accurate diagnostic tests, implementation of regular surveillance and testing protocols, public health education on asymptomatic transmission","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, PCR-based diagnostic assays, mobile health apps for self-reporting symptoms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, individuals in close contact with high-risk groups","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies, technology companies"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of routine symptom screening for COVID-19","Impact":"Failure to identify infected individuals, potential for continued transmission within communities","Mitigation":"Implementation of more reliable diagnostic methods, education on atypical symptoms, and increased testing frequency","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, PCR-based diagnostic assays, advanced symptom tracking apps","People":"Workplace and school communities, individuals in close contact with others","Owner":"Employers, school administrations, public health agencies"}]}
